name: pick_peaks
description: Pick peaks using OpenSWATH

name: select_peaks
description: Filter and Select peaks using OpenSWATH

name: validate_peaks
description: Validate peaks by checking against a reference database

name: quantify_peaks
description: Quantify peaks using IDMS

name: check_peaks
description: QC peaks using OpenSWATH

name: stop_report_after_feature
description: Stop reporting after feature (ordered by quality, -1 means do not stop).

name: rt_extraction_window
description: Only extract RT around this value (-1 means extract over the whole range; a value of 500 means to extract around +/- 500 s of the expected elution). For this to work; the TraML input file needs to contain normalized RT values.

name: rt_normalization_factor
description: The normalized RT is expected to be between 0 and 1. If your normalized RT has a different range; pass this here (e.g. it goes from 0 to 100; set this value to 100)

name: quantification_cutoff
description: Cutoff in m/z below which peaks should not be used for quantification any more

name: write_convex_hull
description: Whether to write out all points of all features into the featureXML

name: add_up_spectra
description: Add up spectra around the peak apex (needs to be a non-even integer)

name: spacing_for_spectra_resampling
description: If spectra are to be added; use this spacing to add them up

name: uis_threshold_sn
description: S/N threshold to consider identification transition (set to -1 to consider all)

name: uis_threshold_peak_area
description: Peak area threshold to consider identification transition (set to -1 to consider all)

name: TransitionGroupPicker:stop_after_feature
description: Stop finding after feature (ordered by intensity, -1 means do not stop).

name: TransitionGroupPicker:stop_after_intensity_ratio
description: Stop after reaching intensity ratio

name: TransitionGroupPicker:min_peak_width
description: Minimal peak width (s); discard all peaks below this value (-1 means no action).

name: TransitionGroupPicker:background_subtraction
description: Try to apply a background subtraction to the peak (experimental). The background is estimated at the peak boundaries; either the smoothed or the raw chromatogram data can be used for that.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:recalculate_peaks
description: Tries to get better peak picking by looking at peak consistency of all picked peaks. Tries to use the consensus (median) peak border if theof variation within the picked peaks is too large.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:use_precursors
description: Use precursor chromatogram for peak picking

name: TransitionGroupPicker:recalculate_peaks_max_z
description: Determines the maximal Z-Score (difference measured in standard deviations) that is considered too large for peak boundaries. If the Z-Score is above this value; the median is used for peak boundaries (default value 1.0).

name: TransitionGroupPicker:minimal_quality
description: Only if compute_peak_quality is set; this parameter will not consider peaks below this quality threshold

name: TransitionGroupPicker:resample_boundary
description: For computing peak quality; how many extra seconds should be sample left and right of the actual peak

name: TransitionGroupPicker:compute_peak_quality
description: Tries to compute a quality value for each peakgroup and detect outlier transitions. The resulting score is centered around zero and values above 0 are generally good and below -1 or -2 are usually bad.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:compute_peak_shape_metrics
description: Calulates various peak shape metrics (e.g., tailing) that can be used for downstream QC/QA.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:sgolay_frame_length
description: The number of subsequent data points used for smoothing.  This number has to be uneven. If it is not; 1 will be added.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:sgolay_polynomial_order
description: Order of the polynomial that is fitted.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:gauss_width
description: Gaussian width in seconds; estimated peak size.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:use_gauss
description: Use Gaussian filter for smoothing (alternative is Savitzky-Golay filter)

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:peak_width
description: Force a certain minimal peak_width on the data (e.g. extend the peak at least by this amount on both sides) in seconds. -1 turns this feature off.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:signal_to_noise
description: Signal-to-noise threshold at which a peak will not be extended any more. Note that setting this too high (e.g. 1.0) can lead to peaks whose flanks are not fully captured.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:sn_win_len
description: Signal to noise window length.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:sn_bin_count
description: Signal to noise bin count.

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:write_sn_log_messages
description: Write out log messages of the signal-to-noise estimator in case of sparse windows or median in rightmost histogram bin

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:remove_overlapping_peaks
description: Try to remove overlapping peaks during peak picking

name: TransitionGroupPicker:PeakPickerMRM:method
description: Which method to choose for chromatographic peak-picking (OpenSWATH legacy; corrected picking or Crawdad).

name: DIAScoring:dia_extraction_window
description: DIA extraction window in Th.

name: DIAScoring:dia_centroided
description: Use centroded DIA data.

name: DIAScoring:dia_byseries_intensity_min
description: DIA b/y series minimum intensity to consider.

name: DIAScoring:dia_byseries_ppm_diff
description: DIA b/y series minimal difference in ppm to consider.

name: DIAScoring:dia_nr_isotopes
description: DIA nr of isotopes to consider.

name: DIAScoring:dia_nr_charges
description: DIA nr of charges to consider.

name: DIAScoring:peak_before_mono_max_ppm_diff
description: DIA maximal difference in ppm to count a peak at lower m/z when searching for evidence that a peak might not be monoisotopic.

name: EMGScoring:interpolation_step
description: Sampling rate for the interpolation of the model function.

name: EMGScoring:tolerance_stdev_bounding_box
description: Bounding box has range [minimim of data; maximum of data] enlarged by tolerance_stdev_bounding_box times the standard deviation of the data.

name: EMGScoring:max_iteration
description: Maximum number of iterations using by Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm.

name: EMGScoring:statistics:mean
description: Centroid position of the model.

name: EMGScoring:statistics:variance
description: Variance of the model.

name: Scores:use_shape_score
description: Use the shape score (this score measures the similarity in shape of the transitions using a cross-correlation)

name: Scores:use_coelution_score
description: Use the coelution score (this score measures the similarity in coelution of the transitions using a cross-correlation)

name: Scores:use_rt_score
description: Use the retention time score (this score measure the difference in retention time)

name: Scores:use_library_score
description: Use the library score

name: Scores:use_elution_model_score
description: Use the elution model (EMG) score (this score fits a gaussian model to the peak and checks the fit)

name: Scores:use_intensity_score
description: Use the intensity score

name: Scores:use_nr_peaks_score
description: Use the number of peaks score

name: Scores:use_total_xic_score
description: Use the total XIC score

name: Scores:use_sn_score
description: Use the SN (signal to noise) score

name: Scores:use_dia_scores
description: Use the DIA (SWATH) scores

name: Scores:use_ms1_correlation
description: Use the correlation scores with the MS1 elution profiles

name: Scores:use_sonar_scores
description: Use the scores for SONAR scans (scanning swath)

name: Scores:use_ms1_fullscan
description: Use the full MS1 scan at the peak apex for scoring (ppm accuracy of precursor and isotopic pattern)

name: Scores:use_uis_scores
description: Use UIS scores for peptidoform identification

name: var_xcorr_coelution
description: correlation in coelution between transitions in a transition group

name: var_xcorr_coelution_weighted
description: correlation in coelution between transitions in a transition group

name: var_xcorr_shape
description: correlation in peak shape between transitions in a transition group

name: var_xcorr_shape_weighted
description: correlation in peak shape between transitions in a transition group

name: var_intensity_score
description: total intensity of a transition group

name: sn_ratio
description: signal to noise ratio of a transition gorup

name: main_var_xx_lda_prelim_score
description: overall quality score of the transition group

name: logSN
description: log signal to noise ratio of individual transitions

name: peak_apex_int
description: peak height threshold for individual and background-corrected peaks

name: var_xcorr_coelution
description: correlation in coelution between transitions in a transition group

name: var_xcorr_coelution_weighted
description: correlation in coelution between transitions in a transition group

name: var_xcorr_shape
description: correlation in peak shape between transitions in a transition group

name: var_xcorr_shape_weighted
description: correlation in peak shape between transitions in a transition group

name: var_intensity_score
description: total intensity of a transition group

name: sn_ratio
description: signal to noise ratio of a transition gorup

name: main_var_xx_lda_prelim_score
description: overall quality score of the transition group

name: logSN
description: log signal to noise ratio of individual transitions

name: peak_apex_int
description: peak height threshold for individual and background-corrected peaks

name: precursor_tolerance
description: Precursor tolerance when mapping (in Th)

name: product_tolerance
description: Product tolerance when mapping (in Th)

name: map_multiple_assays
description: Allow to map multiple assays to chromatograms and duplicate these chromatograms in the output.

name: error_on_unmapped
description: Treat remaining, unmapped chromatograms as an error

name: flag_or_filter
description: Flag or Filter (i.e., remove) Components or transitions that do not pass the QC.

name: report_xic
description: Embed an image of the XIC in the QC report.

name: report_tic
description: Embed an image of the TIC in the QC report.
